item.title: Podcasts
item.description: Here is a list of podcasts I am listening to during my commute, at the gym or any other time I get the chance! I am always interested in listening to new stuff so drop me a message. Bodega Boys Do By Friday Acquired The Changelog Syntax.fm Planet Money How I Built This StackStories StartUp Reply All And quite a few more, that I don’t listen to frequently enough to mention

item.title: About
item.description: Hello! Iâ€™m Mustafa, a software engineer currently working at Brndstr. I work on building chatbots with integrations for brands and on realtime systems for interactive twitter campaigns. I love learning new things related to programming and beyond. I spend a lot of my free time browsing Reddit or Medium for interesting tidbits of information. I enjoy coding as a hobby. My GitHub is currently bare but I hope to be more involved in the coming weeks.
